items.title: OpenAI releases new AI model for enterprise
items.summary: OpenAI has launched a new enterprise-focused AI model that integrates with productivity tools and offers enhanced security controls.

items.title: Global markets rally on positive economic data
items.summary: Stocks rose globally after economic indicators suggested a cooling of inflation and steady job growth across major economies.

items.title: Major acquisition in the private equity space
items.summary: A leading private equity firm announced a $5B acquisition of a healthcare analytics company, expanding its data-driven portfolio.
